Free Online Tools for Images, PDFs & Everyday Utilities

SinzTools is a collection of fast, privacy-first tools that run directly in your browser.

Use popular utilities like an image compressor, image converter, image resizer, and PDF tools like merge PDFs or split PDFs.

Why people use SinzTools

  • Privacy-first: most tools run locally — no uploads required
  • Fast: instant results for common image/PDF tasks
  • Simple: no accounts, no installs, works on any device

Browse all tools to find the right utility for your workflow.

Image tools

Convert, compress, resize, crop, and optimize images (PNG, JPG, WEBP) quickly.

  • Image to PDF Converter — Convert images to PDF documents
  • Image Converter — Convert between multiple image formats
  • Image Compressor — Reduce image file sizes
  • Image Resizer — Resize images to custom dimensions
  • Image Watermark Tool — Add text watermarks to images
  • Image Crop Tool — Crop images to custom areas
  • Favicon Generator — Create favicons from images
  • PNG to JPG Converter — Convert PNG images to JPG
  • PNG to WEBP Converter — Convert PNG images to WEBP
  • JPG to WEBP Converter — Convert JPG to WEBP format
  • WEBP to JPG Converter — Convert WEBP to JPG
  • WEBP to PNG Converter — Convert WEBP images to PNG

PDF tools

Work with PDFs in your browser for common tasks like merging and splitting files.

  • PDF Merge Tool — Combine multiple PDF files into one
  • PDF Split Tool — Extract pages from PDF documents
  • PDF Unlock Tool — Remove password protection from PDF files

FAQ

Do you upload my files?

Most tools are designed to run locally in your browser, so your files stay on your device.

Is this free?

Yes — SinzTools is free and does not require sign-ups.

Which tools are most popular?

Many users start with Image Compressor, Image Converter, and PDF Merge Tool.
